item.description:
U35 is a reading series featuring writers below the watermark age of 35, curated by Dan Pritchard.

Nora Delaney is a poet and translator whose work has appeared in Little Star, Jacket, Sixty-Six, Strong Verse, and The Critical Flame.

Michelle Robinson is a poet and critic working on her doctorate in American Studies at Boston University. Her first collection of poems, "Life of a Hunter," was published by the University of Iowa and was reviewed in the New York Times.

For audio from the last reading, and more information, visit http://criticalflame.....
item.name: Nora Delaney and Michelle Robinson at U35
